column1: Most Americans have a favorable view of the US's allies.
column2: Few Americans have a favorable view of Saudi Arabia.
column3: Few Americans have a favorable view of Russia.
column4: Few Americans have an favorable view of China.
column5: About 40% of Americans have a favorable view of Mexico.
column6: Almost half of Americans have a favorable view of India.
column7: More Americans have a favorable view of Canada than any other country listed.
column8: Great Britain and Canada have the most favor from Americans.
column9: Over 2/3 of Americans have a favorable view of Japan.
column10: Over 2/3 of Americans have a favorable view of Germany.
column11: About 60% of Americans have a favorable view of Israel.
column12: About 60% of Americans have a favorable view of Brazil.
column13: About 60% of Americans have a favorable view of France.
